mvcwebcomponents::exceptions

mvcwebcomponents::exceptions Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

Thrown when View::checkTemplate() encounters an unreadable template.

Version:
1.0

Thrown when View::importHelper() encounters a missing helper.

Version:
1.0
